subject: Advise
description_text:
I’ hello my name us Austin Trombley I am a seasoned sim racer looking for more from my rig and pedals seem to be my next move. I mainly race dirt oval and NASCAR. I currently have the entry level fanatec csl dd 5nm setup. I don’t really need a clutch but I’m looking for pedals that will help me going forward and from what I’m reading it looks like haptics will help along with better pedals then what I’m currently using. And I’ve been looking into your pedals for a few days now I’m just needing pointed in the right direction.

Thank you for your time

Sent from [Proton Mail](https://proton.me/mail/home) for iOS.

conversations.body_text: Hi 47,  Please let me know the issue you need to consult about. Once you send it to me, I will help you analyze it.
